description: Someone's or something's performance is how successful they are or how well they do something.
An object or substance that is brittle is hard but easily broken.
If one thing takes precedence over another, it is regarded as more important than the other thing.
If one thing takes precedence over another, it is regarded as more important than the other thing.
When you compile something such as a report, book, or programme, you produce it by collecting and putting together many pieces of information.
A prefix is a letter or group of letters, for example, 'un- or multi-, that is added to the beginning of a word in order to form a different word.
to make or become ugly or more ugly.
A compilation is a book, CD, or programme that contains many different items that have been gathered together, usually ones which have already appeared in other places.
Something or someone that is flexible is able to change easily and adapt to different conditions and circumstances as they occur.
A chunk of something is a large amount or large part of it.
To optimize a plan, system, or machine means to arrange or design it so that it operates as smoothly and efficiently as possible.
